response.overview: What do you do when you`re identical twins from the midwest and you`re twice as horny as the average siblings? Easy! Move to California and call Vivid. Meet TRUE HOLLYWOOD TWINS, the almost true story of how two former twin TV stars re-create the fame and fortune they found on TV, but in the bedroom. With balls bouncing and cameras rolling!!! And it`s all from the mind of Paul Thomas, adult`s most awarded director. Ever dream of being double-teamed by two hot, horny twins? Stop dreaming. Wake up and buy TRUE HOLLYWOOD TWINS!!!
response.title: True Hollywood Twins
